trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso à funcionalidade de um mecanismo de síntese de fala instalados.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new SpeechSynthesizer object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um novo objeto SpeechSynthesizer, ele usa a voz do sistema padrão.

trans-unit.source: To configure the SpeechSynthesizer to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar o SpeechSynthesizer para usar uma das vozes fala instalados síntese (texto em fala), use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais vozes estiverem instaladas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>método e a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis: - To configure the output for the SpeechSynthesizer object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe também fornece controle sobre os seguintes aspectos de síntese de fala: - para configurar a saída para o objeto SpeechSynthesizer, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para gerar fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: O SpeechSynthesizer pode produzir fala de texto, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>objeto, ou de [linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: - To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Para pausar e retomar a síntese de fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Para adicionar ou remover dicionários, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: O SpeechSynthesizer pode usar um ou mais dicionários para orientar sua pronúncia de palavras.

trans-unit.source: - To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Para modificar a entrega de saída de fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: O SpeechSynthesizer gera eventos quando ele encontra determinados recursos nos prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: Ele também gera eventos de relatório no início (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) e de término (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) de fala operações e sobre a alteração da voz falada (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the SpeechSynthesizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>antes de liberar sua última referência para o SpeechSynthesizer.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the SpeechSynthesizer object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chama o objeto de SpeechSynthesizer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando você inicializa um novo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>instância, ele usa a voz do sistema padrão.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>para usar uma das vozes fala instalados síntese (texto em fala), use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais vozes estiverem instaladas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>método e a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um léxico para o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Um léxico pronúncia é uma coleção de palavras ou frases junto com seu pronúncia, que consistem em letras e caracteres de um alfabeto fonético com suporte.

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um dicionário para especificar pronúncia personalizada para vocabulário especializado em seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Pronúncia especificada em um arquivo externo léxico têm precedência sobre pronúncia o sintetizador léxico interno ou dicionário.

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a pronúncia especificado embutido nos prompts criados com um o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>métodos têm precedência sobre pronúncia especificada em qualquer léxico.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: Pronúncia embutido se aplicam somente a uma única ocorrência de uma palavra.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [dicionários e letras do alfabeto fonético](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter: - The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar vários dicionários para um objeto <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>. Dois valores são suportados atualmente para o `mediaType` parâmetro:-o valor `application/pls+xml` indica que o dicionário está de acordo com o [pronúncia léxico especificação (PLS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: Este é o formato preferencial a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: - The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: -O valor `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indica que o formato de léxico léxico não compactado, que é um formato proprietário da Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: Este é um formato herdado e é recomendável que você use o formato PLS descrito acima.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: O local das informações de léxico.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de mídia do léxico.

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Valores de tipo de mídia não diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> encontra um indicador em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>gera esse evento durante o processamento de um a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre os dados associados ao evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar marcadores usando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Descarta o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> recursos de objeto e as versões usados durante a sessão.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Atua como uma proteção para limpar os recursos no caso em que o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>método não for chamado.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o prompt que o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> está falando.

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto de solicitação no momento está sendo falado.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: Retorna todos a fala instalados vozes síntese (texto em fala).

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Uma voz é um mecanismo de síntese de fala (texto em fala ou TTS) que é instalado no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura das vozes atualmente instalados no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: Retorna todos os a fala instalados vozes síntese (texto em fala) que dão suporte a uma localidade específica.

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver suporte vozes instaladas a localidade especificada, esse método retorna uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e a API Speech aceitar todos os códigos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para executar usando o idioma especificado na propriedade de cultura de texto em fala, um mecanismo de síntese de fala que dá suporte a esse código de país de idioma deve ser instalado.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: A síntese de fala mecanismos que acompanham o trabalho do Microsoft Windows 7 com os seguintes códigos de país de idioma:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Estados Unidos) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Chinês (China) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de idioma chinês (Taiwan) de duas letras, como "en" também são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: A localidade que deve dar suporte a voz.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura das vozes atualmente instalados no sistema que oferecem suporte a localidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Pausa o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando um phoneme é atingido.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: Um phoneme é um componente básico do idioma escrito, normalmente uma carta de uma letra (ou uma combinação de duas letras) que representa um ou mais sons distintos.

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter “c” is a phoneme that may sound like “s” in “cinder”, or like “k” in “catch”.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a letra "c" é um phoneme que pode parecer como "s" em "concreto", ou "k" em "catch".

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Uma palavra de escrita é um assemblage de fonemas.

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: Alterar um phoneme em uma palavra alterará a ortografia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a PhonemeReached event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>instância gera um evento PhonemeReached para cada parte de uma palavra que constitui um phoneme.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word “theme” would generate three PhonemeReached events; one for the “th” sound, one for the “e” sound, and one for the “m” sound (me).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a palavra "tema" produziria três eventos PhonemeReached; uma para o som "th", um para o som "e" e um para o som "m" (me).

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo e informações sobre os dados associados ao evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a taxa de fala do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a taxa de fala do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto, de -10 a 10.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove um léxico do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>para obter um exemplo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: O local do documento léxico.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: Retoma o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto depois que ele foi pausado.

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona uma voz específica por nome.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>método e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>classe para obter os nomes dos instalado vozes de texto em fala (TTS) que você pode selecionar.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the SelectVoice method.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar uma voz, passar todo o conteúdo do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>a propriedade como o argumento para o método SelectVoice.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objeto seleciona a primeira voz instalada que contém `name` a voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>executa uma comparação de subcadeia de caracteres diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas, para determinar se a voz corresponde a `name`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Quando um aplicativo chama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, o método verifica que cada uma das vozes encontrar no registro atenda a certos critérios mínimos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Para qualquer falha de verificação, voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>define seu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>propriedade `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo não é possível selecionar uma voz cujo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>é de propriedade `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os aplicativos não configuram uma voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar uma voz por gênero, idade ou localidade, use uma da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e a API Speech aceitar todos os códigos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o texto em fala, usando o idioma especificado no `culture` parâmetro, um mecanismo de síntese de fala que dá suporte a que o código do país de idioma deve ser instalado.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: A síntese de fala mecanismos que acompanham o trabalho do Microsoft Windows 7 com os seguintes códigos de país de idioma:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Estados Unidos) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Chinês (China) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de idioma chinês (Taiwan) de duas letras, como "en" também são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a operação de síntese assíncrona para uma solicitação na fila.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar esse método para cancelar assíncrona fala operação para o seguinte:-o conteúdo de um <xref:System.String>especificado por um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -O conteúdo de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>especificado por um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -O conteúdo de um <xref:System.String>contendo SSML especificado por um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, Speech cria um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>de objeto popula com o conteúdo do parâmetro do método e retorna o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into SpeakAsyncCancel to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Se você mantiver uma cópia do retornado <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, pode passá-lo em SpeakAsyncCancel para cancelar o conteúdo de falando especificado em um <xref:System.String>ou um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo para o qual cancelar uma operação de fala.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Cancela operações de síntese de fala todos em fila, assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> conclui a fala de um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the SpeakCompleted event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>gera o evento SpeakCompleted após a conclusão de qualquer uma da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>não tem propriedades de classe e não retorna dados do evento SpeakCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Ele é fornecido para habilitar os autores de aplicativos escrever manipuladores de eventos para o evento SpeakCompleted.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado após o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> fala todas as palavras individuais de um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>gera esse evento para cada nova palavra que ele está disponível em um prompt usando qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os dados associados ao evento e um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <xref:System.String> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Fala de forma síncrona um <xref:System.String>que contém a marcação SSML.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do `textToSpeak` parâmetro deve incluir um `speak` elemento e deve estar de acordo com o [linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [referência de linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fale assincronamente uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação SSML, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>para iniciar o síncrona falando de uma cadeia de caracteres que não contêm marcação SSML.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para esse método, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>pode disparar os eventos a seguir:- <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez que o sintetizador atinge uma letra ou uma combinação de letras que constituem um som discreto de fala em um idioma.

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Se não precisam dos seus aplicativos executar tarefas enquanto fala, você pode usar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>ou o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>método para gerar fala de forma síncrona.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> começa a fala de um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>gera esse evento quando ele inicia o processamento de um prompt usando qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>não tem propriedades de classe e não retorna dados do evento SpeakStarted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Ele é fornecido para habilitar os autores de aplicativos escrever manipuladores de eventos para o evento SpeakStarted.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atual falando estado do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o novo estado de que <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>depois alterações, use a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o estado atual de falando do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o estado do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>gera esse evento quando seu falando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>alterações.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os dados associados ao evento e um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar e retomar a síntese de fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando um viseme é atingido.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Um viseme é a posição básica da boca e face ao pronunciar uma phoneme.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes são representações visuais dos fonemas.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Speech suporta 21 visemes para inglês (EUA), cada um dos quais corresponde a um ou mais fonemas.

trans-unit.source: VisemeReached events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: VisemeReached eventos são gerados quando um novo phoneme atingido tem um viseme correspondente diferente que o anterior phoneme atingido.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a VisemeReached event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Como algumas visemes representar phoneme mais de um, um evento VisemeReached não é gerado se o próximo phoneme atingido corresponde para o mesmo viseme como o phoneme anterior.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words “this zone”, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the “s” in “this” and the “z” in “zone”.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para as palavras faladas "Esta zona", um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>é gerado para o "s" em "this" e "z" em "zone".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: However, a VisemeReached event is not raised for the “z” in “zone” because it corresponds to the same viseme as the “s” in “this”.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, um evento VisemeReached não é gerado para a "z" em "zone" porque ele corresponde do viseme mesmo como o "s" em "this".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir é uma lista de 21 fonemas SAPI e grupos de phoneme que correspondem a um viseme em inglês (EUA).

trans-unit.source: |Viseme|Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |0|silence| |1|ae, ax, ah| |2|aa| |3|ao| |4|ey, eh, uh| |5|er| |6|y, iy, ih, ix| |7|w, uw| |8|ow| |9|aw| |10|oy| |11|ay| |12|h| |13|r| |14|l| |15|s, z| |16|sh, ch, jh, zh| |17|th, dh| |18|f, v| |19|d, t, n| |20|k, g, ng| |21|p, b, m| For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: | Viseme | Phoneme(s) | |------------|------------------| |&0; | silêncio | |&1; | ae, ax, ah | |&2; | aa | |&3; | ao | |&4; | ey, eh, OH | |&5; | er | |&6; | y, iy, ih, ix | |&7; | w, uw | |&8; | permit | |&9; | aw | |&10; | oy | |&11; | ay | |&12; | h | |&13; | r | |&14; | l | |&15; | s, z | |&16; | sh, ch, jh, zh | |&17; | th, dh | |&18; | f, v | |&19; | d, t, n | |&20; | k, g, ng | |&21; | p, m e b | Para obter informações sobre dados associados a `VisemeReached` evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre a voz atual do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando você inicializa um novo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, ele usa a voz do sistema padrão.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objeto para usar um das vozes de síntese de fala instalado, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais vozes estiverem instaladas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>método e a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre a voz atual do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando a voz do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> alterações.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo e informações sobre os dados associados ao evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar a voz que o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>usa qualquer o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>métodos ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o volume de saída do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o volume do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>, de 0 a 100.
